articles.title: Verdict expected today in WNBA star Brittney Griner's drug-smuggling trial in Russia
articles.description: A verdict in WNBA star Brittney Griner's drug-smuggling case in Russia is expected on Thursday, and a Russian prosecutor is seeking 9.5 years of jail time, her attorney said in a statement to the media.

articles.title: China fires missiles into waters off Taiwan in largest ever drills
articles.description: China fired multiple missiles around Taiwan on Thursday, launching unprecedented military drills a day after a visit by U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Nancy Pelosi to the self-ruled island that Beijing regards as its sovereign territory.

articles.title: Jurors in Parkland gunman's trial to visit mass shooting site Thursday on what would have been victim Joaquin Oliver's 22nd birthday

articles.title: Senate votes to ratify NATO membership for Sweden and Finland
